oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Trace element data for inclusions in diamond
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Stachel, Thomas
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Database of major and trace element compositions of mineral inclusions in diamond, combined with physical, IR-spectroscopic and stable isotopic characteristics of their host diamonds
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Earth and Environmental Sciences
